intro: A fun gem collecting puzzle game
description:
Dive into the colorful and challenging world of Gem Jam. A strategy and match-3 puzzle game.

In this vibrant puzzle adventure, you’re tasked with clearing a grid of gems stacked in three columns. Your job? Guide a team of colorful characters to collect the gems they match in color.  Clearing three matching gems across the columns causes them to vanish, making way for the ones above. Plan wisely—clear all the gems to pass the stage!

Strategically choose the right characters to clear the gems and create cascading matches.

The game gets trickier with exciting new features. Rocks block your path and can only be broken by axe-holding characters. Move interconnected characters together for an added layer of strategy. Clear spaces in front of tubes to release extra characters and unlock new possibilities.

Enjoy countless levels with increasing difficulty and surprises to keep you hooked.

Whether you're a puzzle pro or new to the genre, Gem Jam promises hours of colorful, brain-teasing entertainment and will put your strategy skills to the test!
